definitions.title: n. pr. loc.1.
definitions.body: ancient priestly city 1Sa 22:19 cf. v:1Sa 22:11 c. [[ה]] loc. [[נׁ֫בֶה]] (Ges:§ 90:2 ad fin.), 1Sa 21:2, 1Sa 22:9; LXX Nomba, Nomma, Noba, etc.; perh. = [[נְבוֹ]] (q. v.) Ezr 2:29 = Ne 7:33, Ezr 10:43, LXX Nabsu, Nabia, etc. Site dub.; on Jerome's identif. with Nobe near Lydda cf. Buhl:Geogr. 189; a Bēt Nūbā lies c. 13 m. WNW. fr. Jerus., c. 10 SE. fr. Lydda.
Is 10:32 just N. of Jerus., station in (ideal) Assyr. march; cf. Ne 11:32 (inhab. by Benjamites); perhaps =
